StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MICheckReprocess]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @TargetImportID int, @Reprocess char(1) OUTPUT )
AS
SELECT @Reprocess = CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ERROR_LOG EL INNER JOIN MIRS_IMPORT_ERROR MIE ON (MIE.MIRS_IMPORT_ID = @TargetImportID AND EL.ERROR_LOG_ID = MIE.ERROR_LOG_ID AND EL.REPROCESS = 'Y' AND EL.STATUS = 'UNRESOLVED')) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END
